verbs.description: [ARG1: something] [V: missing] [ARG2: from game 2 pregame ceremony] [ARGM-ADV: hoping to take a 2 - 0 lead in the 114th world series] the red sox rallied for three runs in the bottom of the fifth wednesday night and took a 4 - 2 lead into the sixth inning of game 2 on a cold evening at fenway david price was locked in a pitchers’ duel with dodger hyun - jin ryu when the sox ko’d ryu with three runs in the fifth j d martinez two - run two - out single to right was the key blow the pregame ceremony was filled with pomp and pedro martinez david ortiz david price dodgers curt schilling pedro martínez boston red sox alan embree kevin millar red sox shonda schilling schilling
